tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Archana & Dr Abhishek  @ Abhirachna Dental Clinic :- Nice, friendly & very efficient doctors.
Listened patiently to my complaints. Took a digital X-Ray & explained to me in detail about my problem, their plan of action, expected outcome & approx time/visits & expenditure.
Reasons for choosing Abhirachna dental clinic :- A) Very near to my home. B) Qualifications of doctors. C) Relatively new establishment & modern equipment.
Dr Abhishek is a maxillofacial surgeon, so his expertise needs bigger settings. In fact he visits 3 different hospitals for doing surgeries 
(Jaw fractures, oral cancers, TMJ, cosmetic surgeries etc). At Abhirachna clinic, he undetakes RCT, dental implants etc. 
Dr Archana is RCT specialist. My RCT was done by her **** ** *** ****** 
The crown/cap was done by Dr Abhiskek (He also advised some specific precautions &  tips for my particular set of teeth).
The clinic itself was clean, quiet & staff was punctual & helpful. Choice of light background music was excellent.
Overall, both doctors are very cordial, empathetic & always kept me updated about the procedures & treatment. 
And thanks to them, I am enjoying toothache free life for last 3 weeks.
Will definitely visit again for any future dental issues. 
--- Parveen Saini
reply_text:
Dear Sir

We are humbled by your kind words. Only a doctor can understand and appreciate the minutae as you have done. Thank you so much!

Dr Archana Bhardwaj.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
There aren't words enough to express the joy I finally  had, to have found a doctor as nice and empathetic as Dr. Archana. I went to see the doctor for getting my front tooth reconstructed and I am happy that I got the treatment from her. The doctor suggested for reconstruction as it was still possible in my case as opposed to an expensive dental implant which was suggested by another doctor. The doctor meticulously re-created the tooth while taking care of the adjoining teeth so that it looked like it was never broken.
The doctor made sure that I wear my smile without having to cover the flaw and that prompted me to write about the professionalism and ethics that the doctor displayed.
Great work, doctor!! 
Thanks a lot, again!!
reply_text:
Dear Piyush

Thank you for your time and effort in writing such a kind feedback! It was my pleasure to restore your smile. Keep smiling üòä.

Dr Archana Bhardwaj.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had the biggest phobia about getting an un-avoidable RCT done and had been shelving it repeatedly!! But super thanx to Dr Archana who handled the RCT so deftly that I didn't feel a thing the entire duration.

I  got her reference from practo only After I got tried hunting for confident dentist. I was told by my family dentist that my rct is difficult so that added my fear.  Then I hunt for female Endodontics. Although it‚Äôs one hour run from my residence but still worth visiting her for my treatment. I visited five dentist since two month but at last searched her and took risk to go to unknown dentist. But I was satisfied more than I expected. Reasonable treatment and very caring doctor. 

I strongly recommend her for the dental   treatment.  Thanks a lot doctor.
reply_text: Dear Neha, thank you so much for your warm words. That's a motivation to do even better. Have a wonderful vacation!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is quite friendly..one can share problems unhegitedly.. treatment is somehow costly but we know the truth behind govt statements that "medical treatment is free" with conditions apply üòäüôèbut in this era of privatisation and boom of technology if you are in safe hand like expert doctors..what else you need..
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words. I absolutely agree with you. I have never compromised with the instruments or the materials that we use, and always aim to uphold myself to the highest standards of care that we can provide üôèüôè
Dr Archana Bhardwaj

review: For any doctor , you need clinical skills and communication skills , she aces both the parts with 100/100 in them both . Very patient , Very friendly and Very receptive and equally good clinically  . I'm so grateful to both ma'm and sir for being so nice . Highly recommended.
reply_text:
Dear Dr Aditya
It has been nothing short of wonderful meeting you and ma‚Äôam. You are yourself such a warm and brilliant person as well as a doctor. Do stay in touch dearüôè.
Regards 
Dr Archana Bhardwaj

review: The experience was really good. Dr. Archana is very friendly and the whole process went smoothly. The process involved scaling and polishing, and Dr. Archana briefed me about the whole process before starting on it. Now, this is a very good thing to do. It made me comfortable and relaxed.

it was an awesome experience. I was in severe pain since last 1 week.  I even visited another dentist last week but he could not identify the exact tooth that was troubling.  so yesterday, I visited Dr Archana.  she immediately identified the troubling tooth, did an OPG &  started RCT.  I had marked pain relief after that. She is exceptionally good in her work &  abhirachna dental is equipped with all the latest technologies. much much better than any other dental care centre.
reply_text: Dear Dr Varsha....Thank you so much for your kind words! This makes us want to work even harder :)

review: I consulted Dr. bhardwaj about ortho treatment and other best possible options to avoid ortho. Dr. has given the information about all the latest possible options available for the best treatment for my teeth condition. I am totally happy and satisfied with his counsel. moreover the hospitality at the clinic is also be praised. thanks for all care.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. Such positive feedback makes us work even harder in doing our best.

review: I went for a regular cleaning of my teeth. After a thorough checkup, I was informed that my funny little front tooth could be made to look better. I got a metal free crown for that tooth, and it is amazing how a single tooth can affect the entire smile. Now, I have a more even and pleasant smile.

A few of my front teeth were placed a little out of sync with the others, and I also wished for whiter teeth. Being a professional, braces were not an option for me. Dr Archana placed all ceramic caps for me, which look totally natural and really pretty. I am more confident about my smile now. Thank you Ma‚Äôam.

I am yet to meet a more friendly and approachable dentist. She is very thorough in her approach and explains the procedure really well. Best part is that she is quick to understand even the minor problems her patient might be facing and ensures the comfort is not compromised.

Worth mentioning is that her clinic is very well equipped with latest devices and technology. Also the staff is great. I highly recommend her.
reply_text: Dear Pragnya, thank you so much for your warm words. They mean the world to us!! Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I rarely leave reviews but this one is worth the effort. Dr. Archana is definitely a great endodontist but she is also a really kind person. Both Dr. Archana and Dr. Abhishek are really patient, professional and have helped me get rid of long standing dental issues.
They explained everything in great detail. I've been to many dentists due to the unfortunate dental issues that I face and can vouch easily that most people do not care for giving a long term solution, instead they just want to make a quick buck and get rid of you. But every penny I spent here was worth it. Thanks to both Dr. Archana and Dr. Abhishek!
reply_text:
Dear Sir, 
I wonder how this feedback escaped my attention for so long, but I‚Äôm glad it did. Because right now, amidst COVID, this is just what we need. A little recognition, a little appreciation. Just what we need to put in that extra effort to treat our patients safely yet accurately. Kind words like yours make us want to continue giving our very best. Thank you so much. Stay safe and healthy üôè. 
Regards 
Dr Archana Bhardwaj.

review: I had been having mild pain and sensitivity after getting a filling done by another dentist. Dr Archana took an x ray and explained that the filling was too close to my nerve. She then did an almost painless RCT and crown and the tooth is as good as new now :).

review: I went to Dr Abhishek for a tooth I fractured as a kid. He referred me to his RCT specialist Dr Archana. She explained everything and started the treatment. The swelling and pain subsided. Now I have an all ceramic crown, which surpassed my expectations, and matches the adjacent tooth completely. I am glad to recommend them both.
reply_text: Thank you so much ma'am for taking out the time and writing such a positive feedback.

review: I went to the doctor for a missing front tooth as well as gaps between my front teeth. She took a lot of care in ascertaining my tooth shade and shape.
